entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15 with temperature falling to minus 18 this afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 15 with temperature falling to minus 18 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clearing. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 21. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023
